1: <pb/><e>Ayic sb'itan jun b'it tic vin̈ cuchb'um yic b'it, a yamc'ab' vajxaque' sch'an̈al sc'anchaji. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, colon̈, yujto man̈xalaj eb' ay elc'och d'a sat, van satel eb' tzach c'anab'ajan d'a scal eb' anima.</t>
2: <t>Syesej eb' d'ay junjun. D'a chab'satil slolon eb' d'ay junjun yic slaj yixtan sb'a eb'.</t>
3: <t>Mamin Jehová, satcanel juntzan̈ anima ayoch d'a chab'satil chi' yed' eb' syic'chaan̈ sb'a.</t>
4: <t>Aton eb' tz'alani: An̈ej tato syal co loloni, c'ocb'iln̈ej chi'. A co ti' tic ol on̈ colanoc. ¿Machto val ol yal on̈ schecani? xchi eb'.</t>
5: <t>Axo Jehová tz'alani: Tz'ixtaj val eb' malaj tas syal yuuj. A eb' meb'a' tz'el yav eb' yuj syail. Yuj chi', yovalil ol in colcanel eb' stan̈van in colval, xchi Jehová.</t>
6: <t>A tas yalnaccan Jehová te vach'n̈ej. Icha val q'uen plata sic'lab'il stz'ai, man̈xalaj jab'oc smical, uquel sn̈usji d'a yol c'ac', icha chi' yaj tas yalnaccani.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, a ach ton val tzon̈ a tan̈vej. Toxonton tzon̈ a coln̈ej d'a juntzan̈ anima tic.</t>
8: <t>Ayic schaan yab' chucal eb' anima, masanil b'aj tz'ic'jichaan̈ eb' chuc chi'.</t>
